messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/13/2002 4:08:37 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Ooooh, I like this.  This would probably really appeal to my gambling father (though I d
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/13/2002 4:08:37 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Tell them to put their predictions of doom into an envelope, date it ten
> years away, seal it, and give it to you to keep. On the date you'll open
> it
> and if they're right you'll give them $25 but ONLY if they shut up about it
>
> until then.
>
Ooooh, I like this. This would probably really appeal to my gambling father
(though I'd probably have to make it $100).

Pam T.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
